Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Relates to requiring the use of a password or personal identification number in the performance of a credit card transaction
Summary: Requires the use of a password or personal identification number in the performance of a credit card transaction.
LawCode: Ren ยง458-k to be ยง458-l, add ยง458-k, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring additional information for credit card transactions
